name: Enable Fine-Grained Access Control for OpenSearch Domains
description: Ensure that fine-grained access control is enabled for all OpenSearch domains to provide granular control over data access and operations. This includes configuring role-based access control (RBAC) and setting up appropriate permissions for users and roles.

name: Enable Encryption at Rest for OpenSearch Domains using AWS KMS
description: Ensure that all OpenSearch domains have encryption at rest enabled using AWS Key Management Service (KMS) Customer Managed Keys (CMKs) to protect sensitive data stored in the domains.

name: Enable Node-to-Node Encryption for OpenSearch Domains
description: Ensure that node-to-node encryption is enabled for all OpenSearch domains to secure communication between nodes within the cluster.

name: Enable HTTPS for OpenSearch Domain Endpoints
description: Ensure that HTTPS is enforced for all OpenSearch domain endpoints to secure data in transit. Configure the domains to accept only HTTPS connections using the latest TLS version.

name: Enable Audit Logging for OpenSearch Domains
description: Enable audit logging for all OpenSearch domains to track and monitor user activities, including authentication attempts, data access, and index-level operations.

name: Configure Three Dedicated Master Nodes for OpenSearch Domains
description: Ensure that each OpenSearch domain is configured with at least three dedicated master nodes to increase cluster stability and high availability.

name: Enable Zone Awareness for OpenSearch Domains
description: Enable Zone Awareness for OpenSearch domains to distribute nodes across multiple Availability Zones, enhancing fault tolerance and high availability.

name: Implement VPC-based Access Control for OpenSearch Domains
description: Deploy OpenSearch domains within a VPC and use VPC security groups to control access. Avoid public access to the domains and ensure that they are only accessible from authorized VPCs or through VPN/Direct Connect.

name: Enable Automated Snapshots for OpenSearch Domains
description: Enable automated snapshots for all OpenSearch domains to ensure regular backups of your data. Configure appropriate retention periods based on your data recovery requirements.

name: Implement IP-based Access Control for OpenSearch Domains
description: Configure IP-based access policies for OpenSearch domains to restrict access to specific IP ranges or CIDR blocks, ensuring that only authorized networks can access the domains.

name: Enable UltraWarm and Cold Storage for OpenSearch Domains
description: Enable UltraWarm and Cold Storage for OpenSearch domains that handle large amounts of data to optimize storage costs while maintaining data accessibility.

name: Implement Cross-Cluster Search for OpenSearch Domains
description: Configure cross-cluster search for OpenSearch domains that need to share data or perform searches across multiple clusters, ensuring secure communication between clusters.

name: Enable Custom Endpoint for OpenSearch Domains
description: Configure custom endpoints for OpenSearch domains to provide a consistent URL for accessing the domain, simplifying domain upgrades and enhancing security by obscuring the underlying infrastructure.

name: Implement Least Privilege Access for OpenSearch Domains
description: Ensure that IAM policies and OpenSearch domain access policies follow the principle of least privilege, granting only the necessary permissions to authorized entities for managing and accessing the domains.

name: Enable Slow Log Publishing for OpenSearch Domains
description: Enable slow log publishing for OpenSearch domains to identify and troubleshoot performance issues by logging queries that exceed specified execution time thresholds.
